description: Kuzui is a double-agent inside Genom who passed information to Sylia in exchange for money, but was also aiding Mason in his search for Galatea. He is willing to sell his services to the highest bidder and states that he has no ethics. On Mason`s orders, he tells Sylia about the search for Galatea so that she could find it for Mason. Mason has him murdered shortly afterwards.
name: Kuzui
